mean_cn: adj. 适合的，能适应的，可修改的
mean_en: able to change or be changed in order to fit or work better in some situation or for some purpose :able to adapt or be adapted
word_etyma: adapt适应 + able形容词后缀 → adaptable 可适应的
sentence: Humans are so adaptable that they can live even in the coldest places.
sentence_trans: 人类的适应能力很强，因此他们甚至能够居住在最冷的地方。
